chapters.title: Chapter 28: Oddities
chapters.info: Deepe Bhadar, p. 444—One of the Asha'man. He is the highest ranking among the Asha'man Rand granted to Rodel Ituralde, one of three who wore both the Dragon and the sword pins on his collar. He grew up in Andor. He has a flat face and long, black hair. He shows no signs of the madness.
